game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom from the mischievous raccoon clan.
game.description: A precious family treasure has been pilfered by a group of thieving raccoons. Your task is to infiltrate their den and retrieve it before they can sell it on the black market.

tasks.objective: Gather information about the raccoon clan's den location
tasks.description: Speak with the local squirrel who has been watching the raccoons to learn their hideout location.

tasks.objective: Infiltrate the raccoon den and retrieve the stolen heirloom
tasks.description: Stealthily enter the raccoon den at night, avoiding detection by their guards. Retrieve the heirloom from its hiding place.

tasks.objective: Return the stolen heirloom to the Town Elder
tasks.description: Return the recovered family treasure to the Town Elder in the town square, completing your quest.
